definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)

sentences.english: This gold whites well, seems to be better than thousands of a pair.
sentences.chinese: 这对金眼白不错，好像是要好几千一对。

sentences.english: Haha, here are the whites of the Oscar, as did more than 20 days old.
sentences.chinese: 哈哈，这里还有对小金眼白，好像才20多天大。

sentences.english: You may see the whites of the eyes.
sentences.chinese: 您可能会看见狗狗眼睛的眼白。

sentences.english: Spherical in shape containing the white and cornea portions of the eye-ball.
sentences.chinese: 包含眼白和角膜部分的牛眼珠，呈球状。

sentences.english: He is a tall, burly fellow with long hair and more white than black to his eyes.
sentences.chinese: 他是身材魁梧，个子很高，长发，眼白多于眼珠。

sentences.english: A few whites and two black gold really good.
sentences.chinese: 几只金眼白和两头乌确实不错。
